about.description: I'm a Front-end developer based near Heilbronn, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life. I'm looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position.
about.request_to_contact: If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, contact me!

portfolio.introduction: Explore a selection of my work here. - Interact with projects to see my skills in action. While coding, I always follow the 'Small Screen First' principle.

projects.description: This app is based on the PokéAPI, a simple library, and provides and catalogs information about Pokémon.

A swimming and shooting game based on an object-oriented approach. Help the mermaid collect pearls and stars to fight against various sea creatures, and find the golden key to open the treasure chest at the end.

A chat messenger inspired by Slack. Users can create channels, send messages, use emojis, and share files. The project places particular emphasis on a clear user interface and the use of Firestore as a database.
An application inspired by the Kanban system for task management. Create tasks and organize them using drag-and-drop, and assign them to users and categories.

A platform where providers can present their services and customers can compare offers. Users can create profiles, place orders, and rate providers. The project is implemented as a pure backend using Django/DRF.

A streaming platform modeled after Netflix. Users can register, stream videos in different quality levels, and save their progress. The backend logic with Django and PostgreSQL manages user accounts and streaming functions.
